entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665
  • LinearGradientBrush spills outside BoxView background. #18664
  • Lightweight Virtualized Items Control #18662
  • Wifi Adapter Controls #18661
  • Maui android Release apk crash in .NET7 #18659
  • .NET 9: Make .NET MAUI trimmer-friendly #18658
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] CollectionView.EmptyView can not be removed by setting it to Null #18657
  • Image Control Loses Image on Page Navigation in Android #18656
  • Button with ImageSource doesn't render correctly when initially hidden #18655
  • Shell does not provide way to change TabBar properties such as font size, family. #18653
    Backlog
  • iOS Application crashes on startup when built through Azure pipeline #18652
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D4 #18647
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [MAUI]Enabling Remove Animations won't make both labels (Label 1, Label 2) fully visible immediately. #18644
  • Image blinks when imagesource connected to mpeg stream #18642
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9530] Completely broken virtualization in CollectionView #18639

Closed

  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • MAUI iOS .NET 7 + EFCore 7.0.0 doesn't work #11513
    Backlog
  • Make MAUI Trimming Safe #1962
    Backlog
  • [iOS] MAUI project won't build with the 8.0.0-rc.2.9530 version on Azure Pipeline #18632
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D3 #18645
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Access denied error when deploy .net maui app by msix on windows #10010
    Backlog
  • Some generated code falls foul of code analyzers. #12196
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test B1 (ScrollView) #18651
  • slow rendering collectionview #18460
  • Screenshot dont work on IOS views #18435
  • .NET MAUI iOS App (Release mode) not working with CoreWCF service. #13840
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.Maui.Graphics 7.0.86 is not compatible with net7.0-android #16009
    Backlog
  • Unable to add an image to a MAUI app project and build it #16089
  • MAUI sample program cannot enter debugging, no errors, getting stucked #16998

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Stepper` #18663
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D4 #18650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.2 to 17.8.0 #18641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D3 #18649
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2088.41 to 1.0.2151.40 #18599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fixed issue creating Paths with PolyLineSegment without points #18643
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net8.0] Revert "Ensure that viewport calculations for iOS ScrollView account … #18646
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18638
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Frame`, `VisualElementRenderer` #18552
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, stale, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • Fix broadcast receiver register on android 14.0/34+ #18520
    area/essentials 🍞
  • fix 18457 #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    area/platform, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR2
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix PlatformStringSizeService on iOS/Catalyst to use correct API #18621
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
